item.description:
Bitcoin (BTC) is an exciting new alternative to Federal Reserve Notes (FRN).

New Hampshire boasts not one but two groups working to create automated FRN-to-BTC machines. Come see what the future holds for these groups, while you pay homage to Thelonious Monkfish, a very recent addition to BitPay's growing cadre of Bitcoin-accepting merchants. If you like sushi, you can only like it more when you can pay in bitcoins. (This restaurant has a diverse pan-Asian menu in addition to its sushi menu.)

More info: https://www.facebook.com/events/390968457667840/

group.name: The Boston Area Libertarian Meetup Group

item.name: Bitcoin Meetup
